-   New translations have been added.

-   New translations have been added.

## v1.0.1 - Jun 4, 2025

-   New translations have been added.

## v1.0.0 - Jun 4, 2025

-   The **translate** function has been incorporated into the package to facilitate obtaining translations.

-   Available languages: Spanish (es), English (en), and Portuguese (pt).

-   Documentation


## v0.0.1 - Jun 3, 2025
